sources.title: Rough Riders' Round-up
sources.description: Title: Rough Riders' Round-up Summary: Now that the Spanish-American war is over, Roy and other Rough Riders become border patrolmen. Their goal is to stop outlaws who are stealing gold from stage coaches and express offices. Directed by: Joseph Kane Actors: Roy Rogers, Lynne Roberts, Raymond Hatton Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 13 March 1939 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 When Roy, Rusty, and Tommy join the Border Patrol, Tommy gets killed in a saloon fight by Arizona Jack. Suspended from duty, Roy and Rusty cross the border looking for the killer. Arizona Jack and mining engineer Lanning are running a gold smuggling racket and when Roy and Rusty find Arizona's hideout, his gang captures them and they are slated to be killed.

sources.title: Rough Riders' Round-Up (1939)
sources.description: Roy Rogers is a cowboy who joins the Border Patrol, only to have his buddy Tommy get killed at a local saloon. Determined to get revenge at any cost, Roy and Rusty cross the border in search of Arizona Jack, the man responsible for Tommy's death. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/rough-riders-round-up-1939/
